stories.text:
Cutting cells in Google sheets is a horrible experience. Come to find out after filtering cells and using CTRL-X not only does is cut the cells I’ve selected but also all the other cells I’ve filtered out! Why is this a thing???

After finding this out the hard way that a few days later cells have been cut unintentionally and then spending hours having to reconstruct, Google sheets lost some points in my book
